## OmvRestClientParameters interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OmvRestClientParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiFormat](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.apiformat.md) | [APIFormat](./harp-omv-datasource.apiformat.md) | The REST API format to use for the tile path generation, will default to the HERE Vector Tile API. |
|  [authenticationCode](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.authenticationcode.md) | string \| [AuthenticationCodeProvider](./harp-omv-datasource.authenticationcodeprovider.md) | Authentication code used for the different APIs.<!-- -->When \[\[AuthenticationCodeProvider\]\] is is used as value, the provider is called before each to get currently valid authentication code/token. \[\[APIFormat\]\] for the query parameter this is used with. |
|  [authenticationMethod](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.authenticationmethod.md) | [AuthenticationMethodInfo](./harp-omv-datasource.authenticationmethodinfo.md) | Specifies \[\[AuthMethod\]\] to be used when requesting tiles.<!-- -->Defaults for each \[\[APIFormat\]\] are documented with each format type. |
|  [baseUrl](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.baseurl.md) | string | The base URL of the REST Tile Service.  \[\[APIFormat\]\] for the definition of <code>baseUrl</code>. |
|  [downloadManager](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.downloadmanager.md) | [ITransferManager](./harp-transfer-manager.itransfermanager.md) | Transfer Manager to use; creates an own instance if none passed. |
|  [getBearerToken](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.getbearertoken.md) | () =&gt; Promise&lt;string&gt; | Function to retrieve the Bearer Token |
|  [tilingScheme](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.tilingscheme.md) | [TilingScheme](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.md) | Tiling scheme is used in some of the APIs, not implemented yet. |
|  [url](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.url.md) | string | <code>URL</code> pattern used to fetch tile files.<code>URL</code> with special keywords replaced to retrieve specific tile: - <code>{z}</code> - zoom level of tile,  \[\[TileKey.level\]\] - <code>{x}</code> - horizontal coordinate of tile (column number),  \[\[TileKey.column\]\] - <code>{y}</code> - vertical coordinate of Tile (row number),  \[\[TileKey.row\]\]<!-- -->Examples of <code>url</code> patterns:
```
  https://my-base-url.com/vector-tiles/{z}/{x}/{y}.mvt
  https://xyz.api.here.com/tiles/herebase.02/{z}/{x}/{y}/omv
  https://xyz.api.here.com/tiles/osmbase/512/all/{z}/{x}/{y}.mvt

```
Note: To add authentication headers and/or query params, use \[\[authMethod\]\], \[\[urlParams\]\] properties or embed token directly in <code>url</code>.<!-- -->Complete examples:
```
// XYZ OSM with authentication using query param
{
    url: "https://xyz.api.here.com/tiles/osmbase/512/all/{z}/{x}/{y}.mvt",
    urlParams: {
          access_token: accessToken
    },
}
// HERE Vector Tile with authentication using bearer token retrieved by callback
{
    url: "https://vector.hereapi.com/v2/vectortiles/base/mc/{z}/{x}/{y}/omv",
    authenticationMethod: AuthenticationTypeBearer,
    authenticationCode: () => getBearerToken()
}

```
 |
|  [urlParams](./harp-omv-datasource.omvrestclientparameters.urlparams.md) | { \[key: string\]: string; } | Array of query parameters to be appended at the end of the url. It is empty by default. |
